title: Patient Service Clerk Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Regional One Health (Memphis, TN) in Nov 2022
Interview Descriptions: In person and questions , star method . Nerve racking and one on one the interview was an event held for one day and it was for multiple positions. The interview took place in a conference room with human resource representative.
Interview Questions: What qualifies you for the position

title: Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Regional One Health (Memphis, TN) in Oct 2022
Interview Descriptions: Panel interview discussion , education, clinical experience. Relationship with patients and their care. Relationship with physicians and patients needs. Discussed how I could contribute to assist LPN on unit, Completing assessments on new patients. Discussed how I meet education goals
Interview Questions: What ratio of patients are you comfortable with

title: Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Regional One Health
Interview Descriptions: Phone interview with supervising manager who made the decision to pass the candidates forward to the interview panel. The phone interview was around 20 minutes; the panel was about an hour with multiple people asking and answering questions.
Interview Questions: Tell me how your experiences have prepared you for this position

title: Nurse Extern Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Regional One Health (Memphis, TN) in Apr 2022
Interview Descriptions: Efficient and timely. It was over the phone so it was convenient. Took a month to hear back . Not bad timing. Hoping to hear from a recruiter soon. Thank you for the opportunity
Interview Questions:
tell me about yourself?
What made you choose nursing

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Regional One Health
Interview Descriptions: First I received an email to set up an interview. Instructions were clear. When I finally go to the interview, they asked me generic interview questions. However it was a pretty  smooth  interview, with friendly people. Come prepared and you will do fine.
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in five years

title: Communications Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Regional One Health (Memphis, TN) in Sept 2021
Interview Descriptions: Phone interview that was relaxed, friendly, and easy. The usual questions, "Tell me about yourself," "Describe your ideal work environment," "Do you have any questions." Did not respond to any follow-up emails.
Interview Questions: Describe your ideal work environment.

title: Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Regional One Health
Interview Descriptions: Nothing out of the ordinary. It was a basic interview process with standard questioning and standard protocols. They asked about licensing and past experience as well as prior education and experiences p
Interview Questions: Standard interview questions for the most part

title: Patient Service Representative Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Regional One Health
Interview Descriptions: Very easy and your basic standard interview questions i.e future goals, what is something that your last employer would say about you and Describe yourself in one word.  What does the word compassion mean to you
Interview Questions: Give an example of a problem you had at your previous employer that you had to fix.

title: Registerd Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Regional One Health
Interview Descriptions: Good interview process. Everyone was very nice and the conversation was easy. We took a tour of the unit and had the opportunity to meet different members of the staff.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here?

title: RN Vascular Surgery Clinic Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Regional One Health (Memphis, TN) in May 2021
Interview Descriptions: Great ! The interview process  was very smooth and the manager was very friendly and informative. Very accommodating and helpful. The interview lasted for about 30 minutes and after the interview, I was told that I was hired and I am a good fit for the position.
Interview Questions:
Tell me about yourself & experiences?
Picture yourself in 4 years

title: PRN Pharmacist Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Regional One Health
Interview Descriptions: Very friendly and welcoming. Asked general tell-me-about-yourself questions and general experience. Due to the pandemic, there were several conversations and questions based around that, but the entire time I felt very welcome.
Interview Questions: Tell us about your pharmacy background.

title: Student Nurse Extern Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Regional One Health (Memphis, TN) in Dec 2020
Interview Descriptions: I  had two phone interviews, they both were simple questions. The process was smooth and quick. I started working within a month. Overall it was a great experience. The most difficult part was making sure you had all the required vaccinations
Interview Questions: What would I do if someone came to work late and you were ready to clock out

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Regional One Health in Apr 2020
Interview Descriptions: I was contacted by a recruiter, who briefly explained the unit type to ensure that I was interested, then connected me with the hiring manager for that unit for a phone interview. Very quick, yet thorough process!
Interview Questions: Why Regional One Health?

title: General Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Regional One Health (Memphis, TN)
Interview Descriptions: I completed a  two interviews total. The first interview was with the assistant manager and the second was a panel interview.   I enjoyed the interview process. It helped me decide if I wanted to move forward with the the company.
Interview Questions: Reasonable questions

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Regional One Health (Memphis, TN) in Jan 2020
Interview Descriptions: Loved my hiring manager, she was very professional and made me feel at ease and comfortable which made me feel good when answering the questions. The whole process took about 30 mins after that I was called for second interview (peer interview). They were very friendly & professional young ladies
Interview Questions: My interest

title: Case Management Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Regional One Health
Interview Descriptions: I applied online and received a call for an interview around 2 weeks later. I went and was first interviewed by the department heads, and then by three case managers.
Interview Questions: How would you handle someone in a bad mood?

title: RN Staff Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Regional One Health
Interview Descriptions: Spoke with manager in the phone. Set up a time to come in and interview and tour clinic. Scheduled second interview with other clinic staff and job shadowed for a few hours.
Interview Questions: Have you have conflict with coworkers? If yes how did you deal with said conflict?

title: Supply Chain Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Regional One Health in Oct 2019
Interview Descriptions: I actually had 2 separate interviews. On 2 different days. It was not a panel interview. Just one on one. I enjoyed the invitation and learned a lot about ROH.
Interview Questions: Explain how your goals align with our mission.

title: Clinical Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at Regional One Health in Apr 2019
Interview Descriptions: Brief phone interview then a one on one interview onsite , the phone interview lasted approximately 15 minutes. It consisted of basic questions regarding the clinical application that I would be working in . Overall it was a pretty easy interview.
Interview Questions: What are the tools that you use when building the application?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Regional One Health
Interview Descriptions: Applied, and heard back from the unit manager within a week, had my interview the same week, and got an offer the following week. It was a quick and speedy process.
Interview Questions: Strengths? Weaknesses?

title: Nurse Extern Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Regional One Health
Interview Descriptions: Super easy, staff was friendly and offered me the job on the spot. Heard about it during clinical experience for school. Just waiting to find out more regarding the orientation process.
Interview Questions: Why you chose this position

title: Medical Coder Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Regional One Health
Interview Descriptions: The process was very  easy and the questions were thorough. They gave clear instructions on where to park and how to get to the human resource office for the interview.
Interview Questions: Where do you see your career in 5 years?

title: Certified Pharmacy Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Regional One Health (Memphis, TN) in Mar 2017
Interview Descriptions: My interview was literally 10 minutes. I assumed I did well but was basically denied because I worked for a different hospital at the time. Which is very unfair when you have years of experience and expertise but aren't afforded an opportunity.
Interview Questions: What hospital do you work for and why?

title: PRN RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Regional One Health (Memphis, TN) in Mar 2017
Interview Descriptions: It is not long, but can be very detail oriented. The interviews are by the person in human resource and then one by the hiring manager. The manager HR department will call in about a week or two after the interview.
Interview Questions: Why I wanted to work at ROH

title: Patient Service Clerk Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Regional One Health (Memphis, TN) in Aug 2016
Interview Descriptions: I was called in to interview for various open positions at Regional One Health's East Campus. After a brief interview process, I was offered a job and hired on the spot.
Interview Questions: What are your career goals.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Regional One Health (Memphis, TN)
Interview Descriptions: Interesting and excellent method of interviewing applicants. First, you get a one-on-one interview with the Nurse Manager. Then, you actually get to shadow a nurse during your interview and ask questions. Expect it to last at least 2 hours!
Interview Questions: Following the shadowing of the nurse, what do I think about the job and my ability to add to the team?

title: Operating Room Tech-Certified Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Regional One Health in Apr 2016
Interview Descriptions: I feel like I came in at the right time. Not only were they looking for text to work in central processing, but they also have positions available in the operating room. They were understanding as I was trying to find my way to the parking garage and get to where I was supposed to be. I had a very good interview. I learned a lot about what goes on, what is expected of me if I were to come on board, and Other Stories of experience from the people who I interviewed with.
Interview Questions: Are you certified?

title: IT Management Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. I interviewed at Regional One Health
Interview Descriptions:
Two phone interviews followed by an all day onsite interview.  The company originally said they weren't interested and then contacted me to tell me that statement was intended for someone else.

Entire process was extremely disorganized and frustrating.  They were very interested in me after the onsite interview until two weeks went by and I didn't hear anything.  When I emailed and asked if they needed any information, they disqualified me for contacting them directly.

Onsite interview was in a dingy office space that was alternately too hot and then too cold.  Half of the people who were scheduled to interview me weren't there.  Every one of my group interviews had at least one person missing.
Interview Questions: Describe the aspects of an IT program.

title: Patient Service Clerk Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Regional One Health (Memphis, TN) in Mar 2015
Interview Descriptions: Interestingly the entire interview lasted 30 minutes for a total of one day which was short and straight to the point specific questions relative about Health Care and excellent Customer service decorum.
Interview Questions: Give a description of Excellent Customer service?

title: LLT Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Regional One Health (Memphis, TN) in Feb 2014
Interview Descriptions: They asked me questions to ascertain the level of knowledge I had regarding the position I was applying for. After that, they asked me a couple of questions about why I wanted to work there and what I consider my greatest strength and weakness to be. When the question and answer portion of my interview was finished, they gave me a tour of the area I would potentially be working in.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work for this hospital?
